comments: Took this class during spring. Prof info: You\'ll find Holly to be very enthusiastic as well as passionate about AT. Very insightful in the field and will be there when needed. Class info: Comprised of 3 exams. She is very forgiving at times and may dish out extra points in the exams. Lectures off ppt can get bland. Definitely not a prof to fear.

Holly wants her students to succeed, and is very passionate about AT. If that is your goal, definitely talk to her. She does what she can to help review for the exam: Reading the book helps a lot. She will try to give any points on an exam as she can. Don\'t leave any answer blank!

Holly is very passionate about AT, enthusiastic, knowledgable and kind. She wants all of her students to succeed and makes herself available for additional help. All and all, I had a great experience in her course and would recommend her to everyone.
AWESOME instructor, class is easy, just need to attend class. very helpful.
Yoga with Holly was my favorite class this last semester. She\'s understanding and laid back.

She should change her teaching methods. Her power point lecture sucks! Doesn\'t help for ur exam at all! Exam is based off the text book and u haf to read every single words and understand it.She doesn\'t like to make study guides for exam..u just haf to do on ur own...she\'s lazy
She should take the time to develop a more effective teaching plan and power point "SUCK". Poorly structured class and never take her class. She is not ready to teach
She is my favorite teacher at SJSU. Very smart and knowledgeable. Relates to students and is very understanding. Cares about you learning and doesnt want you to worry about grades.
She\'s great! Very personable with her experience in the field and is always there to help you out. It\'s great to have her in the department this year.
